text: @News24 @Asive_Xego @BISouthAfrica Whatever approach you take, whether you keep people indoors to slow the spread or not. It's very inevitable that the virus will keep on spreading. Truthfully, if you want to cripple people, Covid-19 isn't the one that'll do it. Instilling fear will.
